# Starter (JS)

This plugin is designed to seamlessly integrate with your existing **[Robo.js](https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo)** project and provide new features and enhancements to your robo. The best part? Everything automatically works once you install this plugin!

<CardContainer><Card href="https://robojs.dev/plugins/overview" title="ðŸ”Œ Robo Plugins" description="Add features to your Robo seamlessly."/>
<Card href="https://roboplay.dev/discord" title="âœ¨ Discord Server" description="Join our Discord community"/></CardContainer>

##  Getting Started

Create a project with this template, replacing `<project-name>` with your desired name:

<Terminal create>{`--template plugins/starter-js --name <project-name>`}</Terminal>

Then navigate into your project directory:

<Terminal>{`cd <project-name>`}</Terminal>

Run development mode:

<Terminal>{`npm run dev`}</Terminal>

<CardContainer><Card href="https://robojs.dev/plugins/create" title="ðŸ”Œ Creating Plugins" description="Make your own plugins for Robo.js."/>
</CardContainer>
